Tiny Giants 3D

Ano: 2014

IMDb ID: tt3739614

Classificação: 7.7

Sinopse: From the ancient forests of North America to the legendary Sonoran desert, a diverse world of wild, mysterious and remarkable animals exists hidden in plain sight. But, the magnificent indigenous mammals are utterly unaware that beneath their hooves and paws lies a microcosm of elusive and extraordinary tiny creatures. With this in mind, this is the exciting story of an adventurous young chipmunk and a caring grasshopper-mouse mother--two minuscule beings dwelling in a world of titans. As a result, the battle for survival in such an unforgiving environment takes on a completely new meaning, especially when you are a few inches tall. In other words, a true tiny giant.—Nick Riganas
